mapper.select: SELECT id as id, tid as tid, android_url as androidUrl, super_sign_url as superSignUrl,super_sign_status as superSignStatus, enterprise_sign_url as enterpriseSignUrl, enterprise_sign_status as enterpriseSignStatus, tf_sign_url as tfSignUrl, tf_sign_status as tfSignStatus, customer_url as customerUrl FROM config_landing where tid = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into config_landing( tid, android_url, super_sign_url, super_sign_status, enterprise_sign_url, enterprise_sign_status, tf_sign_url, tf_sign_status, customer_url, create_time ) values( #{tid}; #{androidUrl}, #{superSignUrl}, #{superSignStatus}, #{enterpriseSignUrl}, #{enterpriseSignStatus}, #{tfSignUrl}, #{tfSignStatus}, #{customerUrl}, sysdate() )
